import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { networkPlusLessons } from '../data/courses/network-plus/lessons'; import { networkPlusLabs } from '../data/courses/network-plus/labs'; import { useLocalStorage } from '../hooks/useLocalStorage'; import '../styles/Dashboard.css'; function Dashboard() { const [completedLessons] = useLocalStorage('completedLessons', []); const [completedLabs] = useLocalStorage('completedLabs', []); const completed = completedLessons.length; const labsCompleted = completedLabs.length; const progress = (completed / networkPlusLessons.length) * 100; // Use 30 days total for the "Days to Go" calculation for simplicity const daysRemaining = Math.max(0, 30 - Math.floor(completed * (30 / networkPlusLessons.length))); return (
{/* Header */}
üöÄ {/* Updated to a Rocket icon */} CertifyStack
{/* Hero Section */}

Network+ Certification

Master networking fundamentals and pass N10-009 in 30 days

{networkPlusLessons.length} Total Lessons
{labsCompleted}/{networkPlusLabs.length} Completed
{daysRemaining} Target Days Left {/* Improved label */}
{/* Progress Section */}

Your Progress

{Math.round(progress)}%
{completed} of {networkPlusLessons.length} lessons completed {networkPlusLessons.length - completed} remaining

Lab Progress

{Math.round((labsCompleted / networkPlusLabs.length) * 100)}%
{labsCompleted} of {networkPlusLabs.length} labs completed {networkPlusLabs.length - labsCompleted} remaining
{/* Lessons Grid */}

Course Curriculum

30 comprehensive lessons covering all Network+ N10-009 exam objectives

{networkPlusLessons.map(lesson => (
Lesson {lesson.id} ‚è± {lesson.time}

{lesson.title}

‚öôÔ∏è {lesson.domain}

{lesson.locked ? ( ) : ( )}
))}
); } export default Dashboard;
